title: Oorvasi Oorvasi Song Lyrics Kadhalan
stanzas:
Oorvasi oorvasi

oosi pola udambirundha

vazhkayil vellavae
take it easy policy
vaanavil vazhkayil
vaalibam oru fantacy

vazhkayil vellavae
take it easy policy
vaanavil vazhkayil
vaalibam oru fantacy

take it easy policy

take it easy policy

take it easy policy

take it easy policy

vazhkayil vellavae
take it easy policy
vaanavil vazhkiyil
vaalibam oru fantacy

kandadhum kadhal valiyaadhu
kangalaal karpum azhiyaadhu

puratchigal yaedhum seiyaamal

take it easy policy

take it easy policy
pandiga thaedhi sundayil vandhaa
take it easy policy

take it easy policy

oorvasi oorvasi
take it easy oorvasi
oosi pola udambirundha
thevayilla pharmacy

vazhkayil vellavae

vaalibam oru fantacy

pagalile color-gal paaraamal

figarugal yaarum illaamal

irubathu vayathil aadaamal
arubathil aadi enna payan.
